attributes.action: Withdraw Legal Aid and replace with Public Defenders
attributes.additional_details: That with immediate effect, HM Government cancel all Legal Aid for perpetrators of violence and replace with a Public Defenders Office in order that the Legal Aid Bill is not affected by the actions of those involved in the recent Public Disorder, also it will reduce the number of Lawyers/Barristers profiteering at the expense of the Tax Payer in defending these Alleged Criminals.
